post.author: 권칠환
post.content:
If you know the job position, why do not you put the  job description and wage range to let people know
the job industry?
I guess that you can add more details about the job position if you are working for CGI.

>CGI GROUP INC. looking for one C++ developer(Jr. level welcome).
>
>Please contact me at 647-293-1730
post.title: [re] C++ Developer
